𒈗 = 𒇽 + 𒃲 LU+GAL LUGAL < regal (kingly) 𒈗 = 𒇽 + 𒃲 LU+GAL LUGAL Ludgar LUGA, LUKA مَلِك malik ⇔ lex, rex
𒈗 = 𒃲 + 𒇽 Gal+lu Gallu / Lugal (crowned king)
𒈗 = 𒃲 + 𒇽 •BAˢᶥLÚ Ba'al Basileo Boss (king)

𒈗 ≈ 𒊐 ≈ 𒋗𒅕 ≈ 𒈢𒅕

𒄡 Tyrant 𒈗

𒈙 GUG5 "Krieg" guerre

𒈚 LUGAL šešig

𒈗 LUGAL Megalon : Big Man

𒈗 Shar 𓇔 < Šartan > Sultan 𓇓 𓏏 𓈖

grammatical suffix ity
